Detailed Description

This class may be used to add a distance counter to any metric evaluator. To use this class, the metric evaluator must extend this class and call UpdateDistanceCount() to update the counter every time GetDistance() (or GetDistance2()) is called.

These methods are not required for the standard metric evaluator classes.

Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.usp.br)

Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)
